message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value, I propose a price of $9,500 for it.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. While I agree the product looks valuable, the price point is a little high for me right now.  Would you consider $7,000?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your interest in our product. In light of this, I am willing to negotiate further. How about considering $8,500 for the product?
I appreciate you working with me on the price, Alice.  To be honest, $8,000 is really the highest I can go.  Would that work for you?
